channel.title: Comments on: The couch looks like a lonely place to be

item.title: By: Doug Brown
item.dc:creator: Doug Brown
item.description: Is the name "Dolly's" some misbegotten Dolly Parton ref? I don't know, sounds depressing and sad. Never trust a whoremonger. That's my advice. Oh, and yes, of course, I always wanted to know what the Indonesian for lantern slide is. What's a lantern slide?
item.content:encoded: Is the name “Dolly’s” some misbegotten Dolly Parton ref? I don’t know, sounds depressing and sad. Never trust a whoremonger. That’s my advice. Oh, and yes, of course, I always wanted to know what the Indonesian for lantern slide is. What’s a lantern slide?

item.title: By: amy bugg burke
item.dc:creator: amy bugg burke
item.description:
I hope Jane comes to stay and you fall-for-really-real-in-love and make babies. Not right away, but someday. All babies are cute, but chubby Asian babies are the cutest. =)
It is hard to believe that there are people in the world who feel comfortable exploiting another person and using them in a way that disregards their humanity. Even sadder that there are people who have to be used in order to survive.
I enjoyed the pictures in the sulphur camp...can't wait to hear the story! Love you and miss you Will!
item.content:encoded:
I hope Jane comes to stay and you fall-for-really-real-in-love and make babies. Not right away, but someday. All babies are cute, but chubby Asian babies are the cutest. =)

It is hard to believe that there are people in the world who feel comfortable exploiting another person and using them in a way that disregards their humanity. Even sadder that there are people who have to be used in order to survive.

I enjoyed the pictures in the sulphur camp…can’t wait to hear the story! Love you and miss you Will!

item.title: By: Marcus Rosentrater
item.dc:creator: Marcus Rosentrater
item.description: I don't think I'd be able to speak to the other teachers that live for Dolly's. Commendable Sanders. I'm going to try to get to that spam problem when I get home. Let's catch up soon.
item.content:encoded: I don’t think I’d be able to speak to the other teachers that live for Dolly’s. Commendable Sanders. I’m going to try to get to that spam problem when I get home. Let’s catch up soon.
